name: carnival-chatbot
description: A chatbot for McGill's winter Carnival

scripts.dev: env CCBOT_DB='ccdb-dev' env CCBOT_HOST='159.203.32.219' env CCBOT_USER='ccbot69' env CCBOT_PWD='devpass' env CCBOT_PORT='6969' nodemon src/server.ts --watch 'src/**/*.ts'  --exec 'ts-node'
scripts.dev-local: elasticsearch | mongod | env CCBOT_ENV='local' nodemon src/server.ts --watch 'src/**/*.ts'  --exec 'ts-node'
scripts.stage: elasticsearch | mongod | env CCBOT_ENV='local' node src/server.js'
scripts.test: elasticsearch -Des.path.data=${path.home}/test_data -Des.http.port=9999 | mongod | env CCBOT_ENV='test' mocha -w test/testrunner.ts
scripts.test-cover: mongod | env CCBOT_DB='ccdb-test' env CCBOT_USER='ccbot69' env CCBOT_PWD='testpass' env CCBOT_PORT='6868' istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha
scripts.build: tsc && copyfiles package.json ../www/server && copyfiles yamls/mgmt.yml ../www/server && copyfiles yamls/sci.yml ../www/server

author: Francis O'Brien
